title: Canonical React Page
description: This is a canonical page with custom animation and SEO-friendly canonical URL.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.summary: Learn about canonical pages and their importance for SEO.
sections.content: A canonical page is the preferred version of a set of pages with highly similar content. Using canonical URLs helps search engines understand which version to index and rank.

sections.title: SEO Benefits
sections.summary: Understand how canonical URLs improve SEO.
sections.content: Canonical URLs prevent duplicate content issues and consolidate ranking signals for similar or duplicate pages, improving your site's SEO.

sections.title: Implementation
sections.summary: How to implement canonical URLs in React/Next.js.
sections.content: In Next.js, you can set canonical URLs using the metadata API or by adding a <link rel="canonical"> tag in the <head> section of your pages.
